thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 4 of 3553
thread.title: Ashley

author: Ashley
title: Ashley
text: I absolutely love Thrift Books. I am a bargain hunter when it comes to books because I read so many so quickly that paying full price is just not worth it. I transition back and forth between ebooks and hardcopies. Typically, I use Amazon when looking for books deals but have found that Thrift Books prices are better. I couldn't believe it. I purchased two Nabokov novels from Thrift books and only spent like $20. To purchase the same books on Amazon would have cost $30, even with my Prime membership. I will definitely be coming back to Thrift Books more often!
